description: Doug is a Pok√©mon owner who was in the Galar region when his Centiskorch Gigantamax and stopped listening to his commands. Ash Ketchum came to help but Doug told him he was over his head trying to stop it. With Leon`s help, they were able to defeat Doug`s Gigantamax Centiskorch and it returned to its normal self.
name: Maruyakude (Doug)
